source:
spark.sql(f"""CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE crm_sanctioneddb.dim_businessunit
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://{fabric_workspace}@onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/crm_sanctioneddb.Lakehouse/Tables/dim_businessunit'
AS
SELECT
    COALESCE(source.Business_Unit_Id_nk, '0') AS Business_Unit_Id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.business_unit_desc_nk, 'MISSING') AS business_unit_desc_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Chemonics_RBU_Short_Name, 'MISSING') AS Chemonics_RBU_Short_Name,
    COALESCE(source.Audit_Hash_Cd, hash('0', 'MISSING')) AS Audit_Hash_Cd,
    COALESCE(source.IsActive, 1) AS IsActive,
    COALESCE(source.effective_start_date, CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE)) AS effective_start_date,
    COALESCE(source.effective_end_date, CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE)) AS effective_end_date,
    current_date() AS Date_Created,
    current_date() AS Date_Updated_Last,
    current_user() AS Created_By,
    current_user() AS Updated_By
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        RBU.new_chemonicsrbuid AS Business_Unit_Id_nk, 
        RBU.chem_abbreviation AS business_unit_desc_nk,  -- Placeholder for description
        RBU.chem_abbreviation AS Chemonics_RBU_Short_Name,
        HASH(RBU.new_chemonicsrbuid, RBU.chem_abbreviation) AS Audit_Hash_Cd,
        RBU.IsActive,
        CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE) AS effective_start_date,
        CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE) AS effective_end_date,
        current_date() AS Date_Created,
        current_date() AS Date_Updated_Last,
        current_user() AS Created_By,
        current_user() AS Updated_By
    FROM crm_query.new_chemonicsrbu RBU
    JOIN crm_query.opportunity O ON RBU.new_chemonicsrbuid = O.new_chemonicsrbuentity WHERE O.IsActive = 1 AND RBU.IsActive = 1
    UNION ALL
    SELECT '-1', 'INVALID', 'INVALID', 'INVALID', 1, CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE), CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE), current_date(), current_date(), current_user(), current_user()
    UNION ALL
    SELECT '0', 'MISSING', 'MISSING', 'MISSING', 1, CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE), CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE), current_date(), current_date(), current_user(), current_user()
) AS source;
